attributes.action: Increase Tax heavily on Cigarettes to prevent as many people starting smoking and to encourage those who do smoke to quit.  The increased taxes can be used to help people to stop.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tax should be increased heavily on cigarettes to encourage people to stop smoking and to prevent as many new smokers as possible.
This would create a healthier British public and also prevent as much polution (as well as not having to breathe in someones else's smoke in the street).

This will probably be disliked by most smokers but will eventually be valued as it will be of benefit to our beautiful country.

Gain in taxes can be used to help more people quit.

If successful (which it will almost certainly be) then an eventuate ban of selling cigarettes could be implented (not soon though i would propose it would take a minimum of 9 years).
